chinese: Marsh小姐,您真的准备退休吗?
english: Are you really going to retire, Miss Marsh?

chinese: 有可能.
english: I may.

chinese: 我还拿不定主意.
english: I can't make up my mind.

chinese: 我得问一下我的未婚夫.
english: I will have to ask my future husband.

chinese: 他不会再让我拍电影了.
english: He won't let me make another film.

chinese: 您的未婚夫,Marsh小姐?
english: Your future husband, Miss Marsh?

chinese: 是的,让我把他给你们介绍一下.
english: Yes. Let me introduce him to you.

chinese: 他叫Carlos.
english: His name is Carlos.

chinese: 下星期我们就要结婚了.
english: We're going to get married next week.

chinese: 看啊,Liz!
english: Look, Liz!

chinese: 这又有一篇关于Karen Marsh的报道.
english: Here's another report about Karen Marsh.

chinese: 你听,“Karen Marsh: 最新消息.
english: Listen:'Karen Marsh: The latest.

chinese: 今天在伦敦旅馆,Marsh小姐告诉记者她可能要退休.
english: At her London Hotel today Miss Marsh told reporters she might retire.

chinese: 她说她还拿不定主意.
english: She said she couldn't make up her mind.

chinese: 她说她得问问她的未婚夫.
english: She said she would have to ask her future husband.

chinese: 她说她的未婚夫不会再让她拍电影.
english: She said her future husband would not let her make another film.

chinese: 然后她把我们介绍给Carlos,并告诉我们他们下星期结婚.”
english: Then she introduced us to Carlos and told us they would get married next week.'

chinese: Kate,这真是条轰动的消息,不是吗?
english: That's sensational news, isn't it, Kate?

chinese: 的确是.
english: It certainly is.

chinese: 他将是她的第6个丈夫!
english: He'll be her sixth husband!
